title: Looking for a rank team.
body: I'm looking for a fun rank team. I'm currently silver 1 and only roughly 2 years worth of league. I can fill but prefer support because ;-; i feel like if i do something wrong in other roles i'll let down everyone D:.  I can skype/curse but prefer not to talk. I've had experiences with plats and diamonds etc so my skills is decent if im not nervous! Just to let you know im a girl and im 14 so i might not be able to rank 24/7. :3 friend me if you would like to invite me!
